title.narrative: FLC: AFG/FLC COAM Women Environment and Natural Resource Management in the Central Highlands
PYM: AFG/PYM COAM Naiset ympäristö ja luonnonvarojen hallinta

description.narrative: Hanke tähtää kestävään luonnonvarojen hallintaan ja naisten osallistumisen vahvistamiseen ympäristön suojelussa käytännön keinoin. Ympäristötietoisuuden lisäämisen ohella hankkeeseen sisältyy vähäpäästöisten lämmitys- ja ruuanlaittoj ärjestelmien testaus ja käyttökoulutus sekä aurinkovoimalla toimivien kastelujärjestelmien rakentaminen. Hanke toteutetaan yhteistyössä Bamyanin yliopiston paikallisten yhteisöjen nais- ja ympäristöasioista vastaavien viranomaisten kanssa. Hanke kattaa yhteensä 18 kylää ja 800 kotitaloutta.

The long term goal of the project is to contribute practical actions planning and policy to poverty alleviation women?s livelihoods and environmental protection in the Central Highlands of Afghanistan as a model for the national authorities. Pilot Activiti es carried out in 2 districts Koh-e Baba area and Shibar. The specific objectives of the project are share lessons learned with provincial and national authorities technology transfer for eco and environment friendly solutions this project will make links between women fuel and energy use in the home and natural resources management as key to sustainable development and stability in Afghanistan lead to innovative learning and creation of model prototypes in environmental protection that also contribute to b etter lives for the people in the Bamyan region target the poor and rural women with skills training practical assets such as community natural resources and clean home environments agriculture and water and sanitation.Long term goal and specific objective s will be met through testing and performance rating of new Bukhari tandoor and solar water heater designs solar irrigation: Innovate prototype low-cost solar-steam pump suitable for micro-irrigation green Technology Design and Metal Work internship progra mme. Unskilled youth interns in COAM Design Lab trained in development and design of green technology in the lab Education and outreach; interesting fun activities trainings and capacity building for the key objectives.
